name: Where Is MY Parking Spot?!
description:
Where Is MY Parking Spot?! was made for the GMTK GameJam 2020! Theme: 'Out of Control'

WIMPS (Where Is MY Parking Spot) was developed in under 48 hours. Grandpa needs to find a parking spot and park! he needs be careful not to crash into anything as good ol' grandpa has not upgraded his car since the 90s or something and it seems to drive constantly until he gets to a parking space, anyway follow the yellow arrow to know where to go, Good Luck!

Controls:
A & D - Turn the car

Credits:

Models/Textures - Danyon "Sonicboomcolt" Huntington
